participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

pet_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered; 2=Youth Self-Administered; 3=Combination

pet_identify___0.Description: Do you currently have any pets? Please select all the pets that you currently have (you can pick more than one):0=No=I do NOT have any pets | 0=No; 1=Yes

pet_identify___1.Description: Do you currently have any pets? Please select all the pets that you currently have (you can pick more than one): 1=Dog | 0=No; 1=Yes

pet_identify___2.Description: Do you currently have any pets? Please select all the pets that you currently have (you can pick more than one): 2=Cat | 0=No; 1=Yes

pet_identify___3.Description: Do you currently have any pets? Please select all the pets that you currently have (you can pick more than one): 3=Horse | 0=No; 1=Yes

pet_identify___4.Description: Do you currently have any pets? Please select all the pets that you currently have (you can pick more than one): 4=Fish | 0=No; 1=Yes

pet_identify___5.Description: Do you currently have any pets? Please select all the pets that you currently have (you can pick more than one): 5=Other Small animal (e.g.=rabbit=hamster=bird) | 0=No; 1=Yes

pet_identify___6.Description: Do you currently have any pets? Please select all the pets that you currently have (you can pick more than one): 6=Other | 0=No; 1=Yes
